item.brutality.atomic_judgement.on_hit.1: §e-Generates a nuclear explosion at the target's location
item.brutality.atomic_judgement.on_hold_: §e-Launch yourself into the air, exploding when reaching the ground
item.brutality.ron_hitta.lore: The one who stands at the pinnacle of all races
item.brutality.ron_hitta.passive.1: §e-Gets stronger the closer it is to Noon
item.brutality.doomfist_gauntlet.lore: Wielded by a long line of Doomfists, it embodies raw power and ambition. With each devastating punch, it echoes dominance upon the battlefield.
item.brutality.doomfist_gauntlet.ability: Charge up a forceful punch that launches the user forwards, transfer the user's kinetic energy into any opposing mobs within its radius.
item.brutality.event_horizon.on_right_cl: §e-Dislodge the §0Black Hole§e, moving it above the user
§e-The §0Black Hole§e pulls in nearby mobs, dealing damage
item.brutality.excalibur.lore: The legendary blade of kings, forged in Avalon and imbued with divine light. Its power reflects the courage of its wielder, a beacon of hope and justice.
item.brutality.excalibur.ability.desc.1: Crouch Right click to awaken the blade, sheathing it in a holy aura. While in this form, the wielder is capable of sending out waves of sword energy, rapidly draining durability in the process.
item.brutality.excalibur.ability.desc.2: While in the awakened form, all nearby entities are slowed down.
item.brutality.fallen_scythe.lore: Forged in the shadows of forgotten battles, this scything blade hungers for the souls of the fallen. With each life it claims, its power grows, echoing the whispers of those it has slain.
item.brutality.fallen_scythe.ability.des: Gain permanent attack damage when on_killing a mob, max of 18 damage.
item.brutality.frostmourne.lore: The runeblade of the Lich King, a weapon of unimaginable power and despair. Forged in the depths of the Frozen Throne, it hungers for souls, freezing the hearts of all who stand against it.
Souls stolen by Edge of Oblivion heals the wielder and gives the user Strength and Resistance based on the number of souls stolen.
Right click to unleash a wave of icy death, stealing the souls of enemies in a 15 block radius.
Crouch Right click summon several strays that will fight for the summoner.
item.frostmourne.stray_army.fail: You can only spawn a maximum of 10 Strays.
item.brutality.gungnir.lore: Has yet to miss a target
item.brutality.gungnir.on_hold_right_cli: §e-Throws a spear that locks into the nearest target in a 25 block radius
§e-The spear will home onto the target until it is hit 3 times
item.brutality.leaf_blower.lore: A powerful yet lightweight tool for clearing debris with ease. Perfect for everyday yard work, it makes quick work of unwanted clutter.
Push nearby entities away with force, ideal for clearing out areas quickly.
item.brutality.murasama.on_right_click.1: §e-Slashes multiple times, dealing 10 damage to all nearby mobs in a 10 block radius
item.brutality.murasama.on_swing.1: §e-Deals 10 damage to all mobs in a 2.5 block radius
item.brutality.murasama.passive.1: §e-Half of all damage dealt pierces through armor
item.brutality.jackpot.lore: Just give me one more chance...
item.brutality.pi_charm.passive.1: §e-Summons 3 π symbols that orbit the user, dealing π damage on hit
item.brutality.pi_charm.passive.2: §e-Each π symbol orbits at a rate of π revolutions a second
item.brutality.first_explosion.lore.1: Darkness blacker than black and darker than dark, I beseech thee, combine with my deep crimson.
item.brutality.first_explosion.lore.3: Justice, fallen upon the infallible boundary, appear now as intangible distortions!
item.brutality.providence.on_hold_right_: §e-Shoots out light arrows instead of normal arrows
§e-Light arrows deal extra damage to undead, pierce multiple mobs and have less gravity
item.brutality.providence.passive.1: §e-Does not consume arrows, only works when directly under the Sun
item.brutality.quantum_drill.lore: A groundbreaking tool forged from the rarest cosmic elements, this drill utilizes quantum mechanics to enhance its mining speed. Each unique block nearby resonates with its energy, amplifying excavation capabilities.
item.brutality.quantum_drill.ability.des: Mining speed increases based on the number of unique blocks around you, making resource gathering faster and more efficient.
item.brutality.supernova.on_hit.1: §e-Deals 10 damage to mobs within the original target
§e-Summon a belt of asteroids that orbit the player and deal damage when colliding with entities
item.brutality.shadowstep.lore: A blade that flickers between glimpses and ghosts. By the time it's drawn, it's already struck.
item.brutality.shadowstep.ability.desc.1: Right click at a target to teleport behind it, limited range.
item.brutality.noir_helmet.lore: A mask and hat worn by those who speak with silence. Beneath the brim, no face is ever seen—only intent. Part of the Noir Regalia set.
Conceals the wearer's nametag from others. Massively reduced detection range from regular mobs.
item.brutality.noir_chestplate.lore: A cloak that sways without wind and muffles truth like fog. Its folds hold secrets best left unsaid. Part of the Noir Regalia set.
item.brutality.noir_chestplate.ability.d: Conceals the wearer's nametag from others. Massively reduced detection range from regular mobs.
item.brutality.noir_leggings.lore: Tailored in shadow, creased with purpose. These walk where names are whispered and never remembered. Part of the Noir Regalia set.
item.brutality.noir_leggings.ability.des: Conceals the wearer's nametag from others. Massively reduced detection range from regular mobs.
item.brutality.noir_boots.lore: Every step is weightless, every presence denied. The sound of your passing is a rumor at best. Part of the Noir Regalia set.
item.brutality.noir_boots.ability.desc.1: Conceals the wearer's nametag from others. Massively reduced detection range from regular mobs.
item.brutality.terra_helmet.lore: Forged from petrified bark and buried ore, this helm listens to the slow voice of the earth. It sees not with eyes, but with pressure and tremor. Part of the Stoneheart Ascendant set.
item.brutality.terra_helmet.ability.name: Full Set Bonus
item.brutality.terra_helmet.ability.desc: Increased knockback resistance and armor. Standing still for 2 seconds grants Stoneform, making you immune to knockback until you move. Landing from a fall causes a small shockwave that damages and slows nearby enemies.
item.brutality.terra_chestplate.lore: Cracked by tectonic strain and sealed with molten veins, this chestplate hums with the slow fury of shifting worlds. Part of the Stoneheart Ascendant set.
Increased knockback resistance and armor. Standing still for 2 seconds grants Stoneform, making you immune to knockback until you move. Landing from a fall causes a small shockwave that damages and slows nearby enemies.
item.brutality.terra_leggings.lore: These greaves move with the patience of sediment and the surety of shifting plates. Step by step, they remember the weight of continents. Part of the Stoneheart Ascendant set.
item.brutality.terra_leggings.ability.de: Increased knockback resistance and armor. Standing still for 2 seconds grants Stoneform, making you immune to knockback until you move. Landing from a fall causes a small shockwave that damages and slows nearby enemies.
item.brutality.terra_boots.lore: Every footfall is a warning. The ground listens—and answers back. Part of the Stoneheart Ascendant set.
Increased knockback resistance and armor. Standing still for 2 seconds grants Stoneform, making you immune to knockback until you move. Landing from a fall causes a small shockwave that damages and slows nearby enemies.
item.brutality.terra_blade.lore: A legendary weapon said to contain the essence of numerous swords, the Terra Blade holds unparalleled strength and power, forged to vanquish darkness and chaos from the world of Terraria.
Shoots out a powerful wave of sword energy.
item.brutality.terraton_hammer.lore: Forged from the unyielding core of an ancient golem, this colossal hammer carries the weight of forgotten eons. Each strike echoes with the power of the earth, capable of shattering stone and bone alike. Wield it wisely, for its strength demands a heavy toll.
item.brutality.terraton_hammer.ability.d: Deal massive damage at the cost of movement and attack speed.
Decreased attack and movement speed while in hand.
item.brutality.resonance_pickaxe.lore: Crafted from otherworldly materials, this pickaxe harnesses the power of resonance to enhance mining efficiency. Its design allows it to harmonize with the unique frequencies of each block.
item.brutality.resonance_pickaxe.ability: Increases mining speed for specific blocks by syncing with their frequencies, allowing for quicker extraction and minimal effort.
item.brutality.dull_knife.lore.1: Channel different emotions to augment yourself. Only works in §cMain Hand.
item.brutality.dull_knife.right_click.1: Swap between 4 different emotions, granting different buffs and debuffs
item.brutality.dull_knife.sad.desc.1: 50% of all damage instead lowers hunger
item.brutality.crease_of_creation.lore.1: Gravity is a harness, I have harnessed the harness.
item.brutality.crease_of_creation.shift_: §e-Launches the §rSelected Entity§e away from the player.
item.brutality.crease_of_creation.on_hol: §e-Select an §rEntity§e and manipulate them to your will.
item.brutality.truthseeker.lore: In the relentless pursuit of knowledge, its blade carves through the veil of ignorance, severing falsehoods and casting light into the darkest corners of understanding. Each on_swing carries the weight of unspoken truths, leaving a path of shattered illusions and unyielding clarity in its wake.
Gain 100% increased experience from all sources.
item.brutality.royal_guardian_sword.lore: None shall sully The King's name
item.brutality.thunderbolt.lore: Crafted by the hand of the mighty god Zeus
item.brutality.thunderbolt.on_hit.1: §e-Gain increased movement speed upon striking an enemy
item.brutality.thunderbolt.on_right_clic: §e-Launches a Thunderbolt at high-speed with reduced gravity
item.brutality.thunderbolt.on_shift_righ: §e-Summon a downpour of lightning bolts around the player
item.brutality.thunderbolt.passive.1: §e-Multiple Thunderbolts can be thrown at the same time
rarity.common.name: §fCOMMON
rarity.uncommon.name: §eUNCOMMON
rarity.epic.name: §dEPIC
rarity.legendary.name: §6LEGENDARY
rarity.mythic.name: §bMYTHIC
rarity.fabled.name: §cFABLED
